unit_learning_outcomes.description: Recognise non-audiological factors that may influence use/acceptance of rehabilitation, and the role of counselling in achieving appropriate rehabilitative outcomes for the client and their family
Critically evaluate device advertising and specifications to obtain information on feature
Integrate information from a variety of sources to recognise suitable candidates (of all ages) for hearing device fitting and factors affecting outcomes

Understand the processes, steps and reasoning for hearing aid fitting and verification using real ear insertion gain measurements, aided threshold testing, aided speech testing, and client subjective comments
Integrate knowledge of technological features in selection and adjustment of hearing aids and acoustic coupling options with case information
Demonstrate an understanding of prescriptive methods and non-prescriptive methods for setting electroacoustic properties of hearing aids

enrolment_rules.description: (CAUD802 or CAUD8002) and (CAUD803 or CAUD8003) and (CAUD819 or CAUD8001)

assessments.description: 3000 word problem based assessment of case stuides
In-class multiple choice and short answer quiz testing foundational knowledge.
On-line multiple choice and short answer quiz testing applied knowledge.
Short answer and multiple choice quiz assessing foundational knowledge.

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 2, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 2, Special circumstances, North Ryde

school.value: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Human Sciences

data.description: This unit aims to equip students with an understanding of hearing aid systems and the principles of hearing aid measurement. It aims to familiarise students with the diverse range of hearing aids that are available and to provide students with skills to determine appropriate hearing aid selection on the basis of client need. Practise in impression taking, hearing aid measurement, hearing aid verification and electronic and acoustic adjustment of hearing aids will be provided.
data.title: Hearing Devices
